userSubmits.title: React & TypeScript Crash Course
userSubmits.description: Join us for a hands-on workshop on building modern web applications using React and TypeScript. Perfect for developers looking to strengthen their frontend skills. Bring your laptop!

userSubmits.title: Pigeon Care Basics: A Beginner's Guide
userSubmits.description: Learn how to take care of domestic pigeons in this free session hosted by the Skopje Bird Enthusiasts Club. Topics include feeding, health, and safe housing.

userSubmits.title: Qershia Internship Applications Open!
userSubmits.description: Qershia is looking for young, passionate developers for our summer internship program. Learn about software development in a real-world environment. Apply online!

userSubmits.title: Career Skills Workshop: Build Your CV & LinkedIn
userSubmits.description: A practical session on how to create an effective CV and build a professional LinkedIn profile. Hosted by HR experts and recruiters from top companies in Macedonia.

userSubmits.title: Remote Work Opportunities for Developers
userSubmits.description: Discover freelance and remote work platforms where developers can earn globally. We'll cover Upwork, Toptal, and tips to build your profile and win gigs.

userSubmits.title: Tech Conference: Digital Macedonia 2025
userSubmits.description: Join tech leaders and startups at Macedonia's largest tech event. Talks on AI, Web3, and sustainable tech. Networking, job fair, and live demos included.

userSubmits.title: Startup Pitch Night: Skopje Edition
userSubmits.description: Early-stage founders present their ideas to a panel of investors and get feedback. Audience members can vote and network. Coffee & croissants provided!

userSubmits.title: Grand Theft Auto News
userSubmits.description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the seventh main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series, following 2008's Grand Theft Auto IV, and the fifteenth instalment overall
